content: Emeritus Professor Morris Sloman | Department of Computing Distributed Sofware Engineering Emeritus Professor Morris Sloman Department of Computing, Imperial College London, Email:        m.sloman %at% imperial.ac.uk Brief CV DSE Photographs Imperial College Medal May 2018 I am now retired and not supervising PhD students, so do not send me applications.
